overview:
Volkan Biçer (28), Co-Founder of Mobilike responsible for product & technology, HR, legal and finance.

Before Mobilike he was working as the Country Content Manager for Yahoo! EMEA Team. Formerly, at Yahoo! he was also a member at EMEA Marketing Team as focusing on audience & community management. Prior to that he worked at Turkcell the leading mobile operator in Turkey as a product manager at Mobile Marketing & Advertising Division.

Volkan studied Management Information Systems at of Boğaziçi University and got his MBA degree from Galatasaray University.
